import axios from "axios"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function AddSsd() { let navigate = useNavigate(); const [ssd, setSsd] = useState({ brand: "", model: "", serialNumber: "", size: "", purchasePrice: "", purchaseDate: "", saleValue: "", arrivalDate: "", }); const [category, setCategory] = useState({ productCategory: "", }); const { brand, model, serialNumber, size, purchasePrice, purchaseDate, saleValue, arrivalDate, } = ssd; const onInputChange = (e) => { setSsd({ ...ssd, [e.target.brand]: e.target.value }); }; const onsubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); await axios.post("http://localhost:9090/ssd/post", ssd); navigate("/"); }; return (
{botao ? ( ) : (
)}
); }
